issues.description: The problem statement (and the sample usage in Main) expects a StockIngredient constructor with three parameters StockIngredient(String name, int price, int quantity), but the template repository only provides a four-parameter constructor StockIngredient(String, int, int, boolean strictValidation). This mismatch will cause students to get compilation errors when they follow the problem examples or implement SealSaloon (which will likely call new StockIngredient(name, price, quantity)). The solution repository uses the three-argument constructor, confirming the intended API is the three-argument version.
